reviewText:
Early Access Review

I can't recommend this game at the momment unless your purpose is to help support development of this interesting game.At the momment [31.12.2015] there is very little to do, there are three game modes.Basically wave attacks and free build mode, i only checked out the free build mode and ended up not getting very far as i struggled with getting my people to work and build something.The ai is buggy as to be expected and the controls feel clunky and very sensitive.

Update:
By clunky and sensitive i am refering to the first person mode, looking around feels annoying..not sure how to word it exactly.

So any one interested be sure to follow the progress of this game for now.
voteText: 8 of 10 people (80%) found this review helpful
